name: No Bugs On My Windshield
description:
No Bugs On My Windshield is an arcade style game with no end, just you, your truck, and a bunch of bugs you need to blast with your turret, trying to achieve the highest score possible.

Your scores can be used as points in the main menu to upgrade your truck, such as new gadgets, energy for said gadgets, and stats for your truck, such as fire rate and reload speed, so be sure to spend them!

A great game for those wanting a quick distraction.
